thread.title: Deepika Padukone Looks Red Hot In This Brand New Video
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone Looks Red Hot In This Brand New Video

author: Swagata Dam
title: Deepika Padukone Looks Red Hot In This Brand New Video
text:
Swagata Dam Mar . 17 . 2017 
The gorgeous Deepika Padukone never ceases to make us swoon with her stunning selfies. And now, the actress has decided to revealed the secret behind her picture perfect posts on social media. Here’s the teaser of OPPO F3 Plus – the Next Generation Selfie Expert featuring none other than DP herself. From the looks of it, OPPO’s new dual selfie camera is all set to drive the selfie expert revolution to an altogether different high. Check this out. 
One for selfies and another for group selfies – OPPO has it all sorted for you. Also, how fab is Ms. Padukone looking in this teaser? Stay tuned for more! 
This post is in partnership with OPPO mobile. 0
